articles.title: Vishal Katti
articles.description: This site, just like me, is under development!

            Bio
            Vishal Katti analyzes personnel safety, process safety, health and environmental performance metrics at ExxonMobil Services & Technology Pvt. Ltd. His focus is on identifying patterns and extracting key learnings for business leaders to act on. He strives to streamline and automate data stewardship activities. He resides in Bengaluru, India with his wife and 3yo daughter, but constantly longs for Goa where he spent most of his childhood.
            
            
            Education
            Dr. B. R. Ambedkar National Institute of Technology (NIT) | Jalandhar, Punjab, India
            Bachelor of Technology in Instrumentation & Control Engineering | August 2005 - April 2010
            Smt. Parvatibai Chowgule College of Arts & Science | Margao, Goa, India
            H.S.S.C. in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics | June 2003 - April 2005
            
            
            Experience
            ExxonMobil Services & Technology Pvt. Ltd. | Business Analytics Advisor | June 2018 - Present
            Tata Consultancy Services | Functional Consultant/Data Analyst | September 2010 - June 2018
